tool_description: Fast and Reliable Company/Employer Searches, Reviews, and more from Glassdoor in Real-Time (unofficial API).
name: Real-Time Glassdoor Data
title: Real-Time Glassdoor Data

api_list.name: Company Reviews
api_list.description: Get company (employer) reviews from Glassdoor, with filters, sort option, and pagination support.

optional_parameters.name: extended_rating_data
optional_parameters.description:
Include extended company rating data such as rating breakdown and rating distributions.

**Default:** `false`.

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description:
Return reviews written in a specific language.

**Default:** `en`

**Allowed values:** `en, fr, nl, de, pt, es, it`

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description:
Return reviews in a specific sort order.

**Default:** `POPULAR`

**Allowed values:** `POPULAR, MOST_RECENT, HIGHEST_RATING, LOWEST_RATING`

optional_parameters.name: only_current_employees
optional_parameters.description:
Only return reviews written by current employees (at the time of writing).

**Default:** `false`.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description:
The reviews page to return (each page includes up to 10 results).

**Allowed values:** positive integers.
**Default:** `1`.

optional_parameters.name: employment_statuses
optional_parameters.description:
Return reviews written by employees with a specific job type. Multiple values can be specified as a comma delimited list of the following values: `REGULAR, INTERN, PART_TIME, CONTRACT, FREELANCE`.

**e.g.** `REGULAR`
**e.g.** `CONTRACT, FREELANCE`

optional_parameters.name: query
optional_parameters.description: Return reviews matching a search query.

api_list.name: Company Search

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description:
Maximum number of results to return (1-100).

**Default**: `10`
